entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. A few snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
